      • getTile

        public android.graphics.Bitmap getTile​(int zoom,
                                       int x,
                                       int y,
                                       java.lang.Throwable[] error)
        Description copied from interface: TileMatrix
        Returns the tile for the specified zoom level, tile row and tile column as a decoded Bitmap.
        Specified by:
        getTile in interface TileMatrix
        Parameters:
        zoom - The zoom level
        x - The tile column
        y - The tile row
        error - If non-null, returns the error that occurred when trying to obtain and decode the tile. This will be used for informational purposes only; implementations are not required to return a value.
        Returns:
        The decoded tile for the specified zoom, tile row and tile column, or null if there is no tile available or tile decode failed.

        x - The tile column
        y - The tile row

        Returns:
        The tile data for the specified zoom, tile row and tile column, or null if there is no tile available.

      • setOfflineOnlyMode

        public void setOfflineOnlyMode​(boolean offlineOnly)
        Description copied from interface: TileClientControl
        Toggles offline-only mode. When in offline-only mode, the TileReader should only pull tiles from the local cache, if one exists.
        Specified by:
        setOfflineOnlyMode in interface TileClientControl
        Parameters:
        offlineOnly - true if reader should be in offline-only mode, false otherwise.

      • isOfflineOnlyMode

        public boolean isOfflineOnlyMode()
        Description copied from interface: TileClientControl
        Returns a flag indicating whether or not the TileReader is in offline-only mode. If true, the reader will only return tiles from the local cache (if available). If false, the reader may download tiles from the server as well as utilize an available cache.
        Specified by:
        isOfflineOnlyMode in interface TileClientControl
        Returns:
        true if the reader is in offline-only mode, false otherwise.

      • refreshCache

        public void refreshCache()
        Description copied from interface: TileClientControl
        Instructs the reader to service the next read for each tile to attempt to download rather than using an existing cached tile.

        This method will have no practical effect if the reader is in offline-only mode.

        Specified by:
        refreshCache in interface TileClientControl

      • setCacheAutoRefreshInterval

        public void setCacheAutoRefreshInterval​(long milliseconds)
        Description copied from interface: TileClientControl
        Sets the cache refresh interval for the reader. When the refresh interval is exceeded, the reader should download a new tile from the server rather than utilizing a cached tile.
        Specified by:
        setCacheAutoRefreshInterval in interface TileClientControl
        Parameters:
        milliseconds - The refresh interval, in milliseconds. A value of zero indicates that auto-refresh is disabled; use of values less than zero is undefined.

      • getCacheAutoRefreshInterval

        public long getCacheAutoRefreshInterval()
        Specified by:
        getCacheAutoRefreshInterval in interface TileClientControl
